text:
I am updating an older CM where I linked a JS with a callback to run a function after load but I am not longer able to use get_public_template_url. Because I have to "attach" the JS file (as in templates), but If I move there I can't link that with a callback neither with jQuery.getScript(URL).done()
do you really need to cut our wings? (import, get_public_template_url ...) :persevere:
i was adding some brackets and it just doing an autoadd, then removed then added then remove
and so on for like 2 mins. It was saving then not then saving then not
^ i’ve had that happen. it was happening a lot last week whenever I was writing a choice hubl module with the array syntax of [\“value\“, \“label\“]
Yeah that was happening to me earlier this week
I was editing some footer html in a template iirc
Really annoying, had to keep refreshing
yeek, that sounds kinda scary. I haven’t experienced that yet.
